page.title: 17 TOURISM
page.content: Tourists come here because they like the seaside, the countryside, and the moors. The most popular kind of holiday is camping and caravanning. People also stay in hotels, guest houses, farms, and self_ catering chalets. We like tourists to come and visit where we live because they buy our crafts and spend lots of money. One third of our income comes from tourism, one third comes from agriculture and the other one third comes from industry. In summer the population almost doubles and that means the hospitals, the police and other services get bigger demand.
